Mailing Address: c/o Children’s Heart Network5151 Canada Way, #300Burnaby, BC     V5E 3N1
Service Details: - Offers parent-to-parent support so that you can talk to trained resource parents with lived experience who offer their support, advice, and information- Organizes two summer camps for children and youth from across the province (children 8-12 years and teens 13-19 years)- Offers bi-annual conference for parents and professionals and regular educational workshops for parents and youth- Provides information and resources on congenital and acquired heart disease
